title: New thread about Buying or Trading for name at tops
author: Phillies*phan

posts.post_title: New thread about Buying or Trading for name at tops
posts.post_content: Had a lull for a month or two but just had a great week.  Thanks goes to Mr. Hahn, Mr. Hogue, Mr. Bussineau, and Mr. Mize.  I was contacted by all of them with these cards to sell.  It's great I've gotten into peoples subconscious.  Let's keep them coming please. [url]dmb102175@comcast.net[/url]

great cards!! great work my friend.....how many you have now??I think you have all mine now:)


this is what I originally set out to do....collect name at tops....glad to see someone is trying to complete this.....a huge feat

I'm looking forward to your progress:D

Doug

The person you bought the Stone from also had this Elberfeld.

I'm familiar with both of them because I think they came from the same sheet.


Jantz
Anyone have a  card with at least 3/4's of the name at top?  No slivers please.

Great focus....

I'm still hunting for you....
Any new people have one to sell? Or old.  I won't discriminate.

I picked up the Elberfeld. My first 2 Name T206. It cost a bit more than I wanted to spend but I was glad to add it to my collection.

Regards
John P
